Articles.Content:
Anyone else find Kerbal Engineering Redux has ceased to load under 1.2?

I've cleanly reinstalled v1.2, and removed all mods. Adding back only KER resulted in the following exception:

[LOG 00:30:47.101] AssemblyLoader: Loading assemblies
[ERR 00:30:47.151] ADDON BINDER: Cannot resolve assembly: KSPUtil, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null

[ERR 00:30:47.152] ADDON BINDER: Cannot resolve assembly: KSPUtil, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null
[ERR 00:30:47.174] AssemblyLoader: Exception loading 'KerbalEngineer': System.Reflection.ReflectionTypeLoadException: The classes in the module cannot be loaded.
  at (wrapper managed-to-native) System.Reflection.Assembly:GetTypes (bool)
  at System.Reflection.Assembly.GetTypes () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
  at AssemblyLoader.LoadAssemblies () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
 
Followed by a list of all the classes it couldn't find.
I could live without most other mods, but not KER! Manual dV calculations anyone?
Not sure if this is endemic to only my machine or a more common problem.

Check the release thread.

No, there isn't a released version for 1.2 yet. If you look at the thread you'll find a pre-release dev release, but there's still a few kinks to work out and you're on your own with it.
